---
agent: Plan
---
use `issue_write` tool to create a detailed GitHub issue and assign the label `jules` to it. The issue should follow the template below:

```markdown
## Title
[Concise, descriptive title of the issue]
## Overview
[1-2 sentence description - what is being built]
## Files Involved
- [List of files that will be changed/created]
## Requirements
- [ ] Clear list of functional requirements
